pre_existing_conditions.conditions: No pre-existing medical conditions are covered under this policy.

eligibility_criteria: You are a Singapore citizen or a permanent resident of Singapore
You have to be aged over 1 month to 74 years old, before the start of Your trip.
You must be at least 12 years old and not more than 69 years old
You must be a fare-paying passenger on a Scheduled Flight

If an insured person has ever been refused cover or had special terms placed on them by any insurer for travel insurance, they must declare this at the point of application and We must accept them, or there will be no cover for them
At the time You send us Your application for this insurance, none of the intended insured persons have already left Singapore on any trip meant to be covered by this insurance
You must be a Singapore citizen or a permanent resident
age between 0 and 120
criterion1
You must have a valid passport
You must not be under treatment not recommended by or carried out by a Doctor, Dentist or TCM practitioner
You must be a KrisFlyer member
You must purchase the insurance before departing Singapore.
Any insured child under the age of 12 years must be accompanied by a parent or adult guardian during the trip
You must be a Singaporean citizen or resident
You must be a Singapore citizen or a permanent resident of Singapore
At the time of arranging the trip or taking out this insurance, neither You nor any other insured person is aware of any circumstances which are likely to lead to a claim under the Policy
You must be travelling on a return trip
You must be a Singaporean citizen or a permanent resident of Singapore
You must be a KrisFlyer member for return trips only
You must be at least 21 years old
You must purchase this Policy at least 7 days before the date of Your trip
You must be at least 18 years old
Singapore citizen or resident
The trip must begin in Singapore

medical_expenses.description: Reasonable expenses for medical treatment of bodily Injury or Illness by a Doctor covered under this Policy.

repatriation_of_mortal_remains.description: We will arrange and pay for the cost of transporting Your mortal remains back to Singapore.

emergency_medical_evacuation.description: We will arrange and pay for Your transfer under medical supervision, including costs of transportation and medical supplies necessarily incurred for the evacuation/repatriation.

travel_delay.description: Reimbursement for every six consecutive hours of delay

travel_misconnection.description: Reimbursement for every full six consecutive hours of misconnection

baggage_delay.description: Reimbursement for every six consecutive hours of delay

loss_of_frequent-flyer_points.description: Reimbursement for unutilised, pre-paid and non-refundable costs of scheduled flight and/or accommodation

hospitalisation_allowance.description: Daily benefit amount for each day of Hospitalisation Overseas due to COVID-19 diagnosis

overseas_quarantine_allowance.description: Daily benefit amount for each day of quarantine or isolation order completed due to COVID-19 diagnosis

hospital_income.description: Daily benefit amount for each complete 24-hour period of Hospital Confinement due to Injury or Illness sustained whilst Overseas on a trip

fraudulent_credit_card_usage.description: Reimbursement of unauthorised charges incurred due to theft or loss of personal credit card

accidental_death_and_permanent_disableme.description: Benefit amount for accidental death or permanent disablement within specified timeframes

requirements: You must provide medical certificates and receipts for expenses
Medical treatment must first be sought whilst You are Overseas and a claim made under Section 3 – Medical Expenses Whilst Overseas becomes payable
You must seek medical treatment Overseas

Any treatment by a specialist must be referred by the attending Doctor and shall not exceed the usual level of charges for similar treatment or medical supplies in the location where the expenses are incurred had this insurance not existed.
You must be a KrisFlyer member
You must have a doctor's recommendation for treatment
You must have a valid medical certificate
The insured persons are not travelling against the advice of a doctor or for the purpose of getting medical treatment
medical report
the date of Your return to Singapore is within the Period of Insurance
Diagnosis of COVID-19 by a Doctor
You must incur medical expenses within 30 days from the date of injury or illness
proof of purchase
exclusions: Pregnancy, menopause, childbirth, abortion or miscarriage and all related conditions
Expenses incurred for services provided by another party for which You are not liable to pay, or any expenses already included in the costs of the trip
war, terrorism, radioactive contamination, chemical, biological, biochemical and electromagnetic weapons, political risks, cyber exclusion
Pre-Existing Medical Conditions
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused
pre-existing medical conditions
Your failure to obtain any recommended vaccines, inoculations or medications prior to Your trip based on the requirements of the government in Singapore or destination country
war-related injuries

Your travel to a country, specific area or event when the government in Singapore or destination country has issued travel advisory against travelling to or to defer non-essential travel to the planned destination
Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
War and civil unrest
expenses incurred for prostheses or any medical supplies unless prescribed by the Doctor for the treatment of Your Injury or Illness
Dental treatment due to tooth or gum or oral diseases, or from normal wearing out of Your teeth
expenses incurred for prostheses, contact lenses, spectacles, hearing aids, dentures or medical equipment unless prescribed by the Doctor for the treatment of injury or illness
Pre-existing conditions
Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) Expenses

requirements: travel itinerary
You must have a valid travel itinerary
You must have purchased this Policy before You become aware of any circumstances which could lead to the cancellation of Your trip
You must be a KrisFlyer member
You must have a doctor's certificate for cancellation
You must be a fare-paying passenger on a Scheduled Flight
Cancellation of trip within 30 days before commencement due to COVID-19 diagnosis, hospitalisation or quarantine
proof of travel booking
You must provide proof of cancellation and travel documents
exclusions: Circumstances known to You before You purchased Your Policy or at the time of booking any trip which could reasonably have been expected to lead to cancelling the trip
if this Policy was purchased less than three (3) days before the commencement of Your trip
Any benefits already paid under Section 14 – Loss of Frequent Flyer Points for the same event
acts of terrorism
natural disasters
Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Changes to travel advisory or restrictions
Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section
loss of vouchers, reward points or holiday points (other than what is covered under Section 14 – Loss of Frequent Flyer Points) that You have used, in part or full, to pay for the Scheduled Flight
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused
Cancellation due to unforeseen circumstances not covered by the policy
Travel arrangement, COVID-19 prevention measures

requirements: You must provide proof of loss and police report
You must have a valid receipt for the lost or damaged item
police report
proof of ownership
You must have a valid baggage receipt
You must report the loss to the authorities
exclusions: Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused
Loss or theft due to negligence
Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Loss or theft due to intentional act
Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section
valuable items left unattended
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
General Exclusions
Loss or theft due to negligence or intentional act
expenses incurred for services provided by another party for which You are not liable to pay, or any expenses already included in the cost of the scheduled trip
expenses for a service not approved and arranged by Our Medical Assistance Provider or its authorized representative
Expenses related to religious ceremony or rites
expenses incurred for services provided by another party for which You are not liable to pay, or any expenses already included in the costs of the trip
expenses for a service not approved and arranged by Our Medical Assistance Provider or its authorised representative
treatment performed or ordered by a person who is not a Doctor
expenses incurred if treatment can be reasonably delayed until Your return to Singapore

Your travel to a country, specific area or event when the government in Singapore or destination country has issued travel advisory against travelling to or to defer non-essential travel to the planned destination
Your failure to obtain any recommended vaccines, inoculations or medications prior to Your trip based on the requirements of the government in Singapore or destination country

requirements: You must have a valid receipt for the delay
exclusions: Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section

requirements: You must have a valid receipt for the misconnection
exclusions: Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section

requirements: You must have a valid receipt for the delay
exclusions: Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section

requirements: You must have a valid receipt for the loss of frequent flyer points
exclusions: Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the ‘When We will pay’ section

requirements: report the loss to the police within 24 hours
provide proof of purchase of the articles
exclusions: unexplained and mysterious disappearance of personal belongings
loss or damage caused by wear and tear
loss in value, deterioration, insects, vermin, mildew, atmospheric conditions
the action of light, any process of heating, cleaning, repairing
restoring, mechanical or electrical breakdown, misuse, faulty design or workmanship

requirements: not admit, deny or make any offer or promise or indemnity without Our written consent
send Us any writ, summons or other documents in connection with the claim immediately upon Your receipt of the same
exclusions: anyone who has caught any illness or disease from You
damage to property in Your custody or control
death, Injury and damage to the property of or to any of Your relatives, Your Travelling Companion or people who work for or with You

requirements: any claims must be supported by a police report or a report issued by the operator of the Public Transport confirming that You were a victim of a Hijack and the duration of the Hijack
exclusions: General Exclusions
the consequences of an Act of Terrorism if: (a) the event is compensated by any government authority; or (b) it leads to Your fear of travelling

requirements: You must be diagnosed with COVID-19
You must be Hospitalised Overseas
exclusions: Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused

requirements: You must be diagnosed with COVID-19
You must be given quarantine or isolation order by local authorities Overseas
exclusions: Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused

requirements: You must be Hospital Confinement due to Injury or Illness sustained whilst Overseas on a trip
exclusions: Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused

requirements: You must report the theft of Your personal credit card to the issuer(s) and to Us within 24-hours of discovering that Your personal credit card was stolen or any unauthorised charges were made from it
exclusions: Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused

requirements: You must be a KrisFlyer member
You must be a fare-paying passenger on a Scheduled Flight
exclusions: Losses that have occurred prior to the inception of cover or, after the termination of the Policy
Losses that result from any business pursuits or, relating to Your work or profession
Losses caused by any illegal acts on Your part
Losses that You have intentionally or deliberately caused

strengths: Comprehensive coverage for medical expenses, trip cancellation, and baggage loss
Reasonable medical coverage with a maximum of SGD 100,000
Comprehensive trip cancellation coverage with a maximum of SGD 50,000
Baggage loss coverage with a maximum of SGD 20,000
limitations: Age restrictions: minimum 1 month, maximum 120 years
Limited coverage for certain benefits, such as loss of passport money and personal liability
unique_features: Comprehensive coverage for emergency medical evacuation and repatriation of mortal remains

standard_conditions: Doctor referral required for medical expenses
Deductible of SGD 5,000 for all benefits
typical_exclusions: Losses caused by intentional or deliberate acts
Losses resulting from business pursuits or work-related activities
